The smell could also be sexually selected. That is it has no bearing on the organisms survivability and only exists because one of the sexes selects for it. In fact it could be a waste of energy that serves no purpose other than attracting a mate.

Edit: it's actually recently been argued that it's a fallacy to argue that a sexually selected trait must transmit information about an organism's health. Sexually selected traits can often be detrimental to an organism's heslth
